story_99_00060/2401_1001_0100_10:
Ah, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
I was hoping I’d run into you!
story_99_00060/2401_1001_0200_10:
I’ve made leaps and bounds in my research on
sync pairs lately. If my new hypothesis is correct,
you should be able to grow even stronger now!
story_99_00060/2401_1001_0300_10:
I believe you and your Pokémon can unleash
an even greater power together! Why don’t we
meet up here—I’d love to test out my theory!
